titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 1752) for the relief of Sergeant Major Earnest Sands (Ret.) and Roger Sands to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Refers H.R. 1752 (for the relief of certain named individuals) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.
